# value

**Instance Property**

The value for the mutable metadata item.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying var value: (any NSCopying & NSObjectProtocol)? { get set }
```

## Accessing values

- **extraAttributes**: A dictionary of additional attributes for a metadata item.
- **dataType**: The data type of the metadata item’s value.
- **stringValue**: The value of the metadata item as a string.
- **numberValue**: The value of the metadata item as a number.
- **dateValue**: The value of the metadata item as a date.
- **dataValue**: The value of the metadata item as a data value.
